WeaponTraitDef.label: psychic resilience
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's wielder will not crack under pressure. As long as they are drafted, they will not be at risk of suffering a mental break.

WeaponTraitDef.label: satiating
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon psychically suppresses the wielder's appetite.

WeaponTraitDef.label: sharpshooter’s focus
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon is so easy to handle and wield that it will increase the wielders shooting skill just by having it equipped.

WeaponTraitDef.label: adrenal rush
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon floods the wielder with a surge of combat stimulants upon landing a kill, briefly heightening reflexes and movement speed.

WeaponTraitDef.label: radiant core
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon is powered by a faulty vanometric power source that will occasionally produce bursts of dirty radiation, affecting its wielder with toxic buildup.
